definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: Trademark registrants enjoy trademark rights and receive protection under law.
sentences.chinese: 商標註冊人享有商標權，受法律保護。

sentences.english: Trademark registrants enjoy trademark rights and receive protection under law.
sentences.chinese: 商標註冊人享有商標權，受法律保護。

sentences.english: After examination and approval by the Trademark Office, a corresponding certificate shall be issued to the registrant and the change shall be published.
sentences.chinese: 經商標局覈准後，發給註冊人相應證明，並予以公告。

sentences.english: Products bearing famous trademarks sell well.
sentences.chinese: 標有名牌商標的產品暢銷。

sentences.english: However, that does not necessary mean that a logo has to be very elaborated.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這並不意味着商標非得特別複雜。

sentences.english: These patricians don’t need gaudy symbols to advertise their wealth.
sentences.chinese: 這羣貴族並不需要花俏的商標來炫耀他們的財富。

sentences.english: In Japan, the brand, Zojirushi, which represents comfort has been impressed on everyone.
sentences.chinese: 在日本，這個代表着舒適的象印商標已深入人心。

sentences.english: We just peel the stickers off, cut them up, and throw them in your iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 我們只是揭掉商標然後把它們切成片丟進你的冰茶裏。

sentences.english: UR BRND AS ITS ALRDY REGD BY OTRS-cannot use your brand as it is already registered by others.
sentences.chinese: 不能用你們的商標牌號，因這種商標別人已註冊。

sentences.english: UR BRND AS ITS ALRDY REGD BY OTRS-cannot use your brand as it is already registered by others.
sentences.chinese: 不能用你們的商標牌號，因這種商標別人已註冊。

sentences.english: At present, homophonic transliteration has become a fashion in the translation of trademarks.
sentences.chinese: 時下，諧音譯在商標翻譯中成爲一種時髦。

sentences.english: Do not violate third-party intellectual property rights, including copyrights and trademarks.
sentences.chinese: 請勿侵害包括版權，商標在內的第三方知識產權。

sentences.english: The administrative departments of industry and commerce at all levels shall be responsible for the administration of famous trademarks.
sentences.chinese: 各級工商行政管理部門負責著名商標的管理工作。

sentences.english: Beer paper trademark appeared about in middle 18th century.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒紙商標的出現大約是在18世紀中葉。
那兩個淺淺的酒窩就是她的商標。

definition: patent/sth uniquely enjoyed (or possessed etc) by a certain group of people/monopoly
variant of 標誌|标志[biao1 zhi4]
model or template character/written slogan or phrase/mention (e.g. "air mail" 航空 on a letter, "first draft" 初稿 on a document etc)
Dachang Hui autonomous county in Langfang 廊坊[Lang2 fang2], Hebei
